#summary Help Page

== XML node types ==

  * [http://code.google.com/p/verysimplexml/wiki/ntElement ntElement] (default node type)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/verysimplexml/wiki/ntComment ntComment] (comment nodes)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/verysimplexml/wiki/ntDocType ntDocType] (Document Type Definition, but not parsed/evaluated)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/verysimplexml/wiki/ntText ntText] (text only nodes)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/verysimplexml/wiki/ntCData ntCData] (CDATA sections)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/verysimplexml/wiki/ntProcessingInstr ntProcessingInstr] (processing instructions)
